name: Triangle Arcade
description:
A short and simple arcade game with the aim of surviving until the end.

Comes with different difficulties and different movement styles to fit your skill level.

Could burn about 5-15 minutes of your boredom.

*Requires confident and accurate maneuvering of the mouse*

This game will test your 2D topdown aiming ability

I challenge you to  play the "Truck Load of Cake" difficulty with Straight Movement

Just dont ragequit.

Intalling the game:

1. Download the File

2. Unzip the File 

3. Run the Executable Program Inside the File
